p: As older patients usually receive care from general physicians and specialists other than geriatricians and nephrologists, it is important that all graduates in medicine have adequate knowledge about dose adjustment recommendations in subjects with impaired renal function. The aim of the study was to assess the knowledge of medical students and post-graduate trainees in internal medicine with regard to drug prescribing recommendations in older patients with impaired kidney function defined as eGFR < 30 mL/min/1.73m 2.
